body.name: MFi Certified 128GB Flash Drive for iPhone Photo Stick USB Memory Stick Thumb Drives, High Speed USB Stick External Storage for iPhone/iPad/Android/PC

features: MFI certified flash drive: safer and more durable. The iphone flash drive is made of high-quality metal materials and the latest upgraded chip technology, with excellent waterproof, shockproof, temperature resistance, and magnetic resistance capabilities. This allows you to store data more securely without worrying about data loss. Additionally, our thumb drive comes with a keychain design, which allows you to easily attach the usb drive to a key or a lanyard for easy portability.

Unique 3-in-1 design: The usb stick has a USB/lightning/type-c (independent adapter) interface, which is convenient for data transmission between different devices and gets rid of the shackles of data cables and iCloud. You can store your favorite videos, photos, movies, and music directly on the memory stick and watch them on your mobile phone at any time. Enjoy the convenience that USB flash drive for iphone brings, providing you with more space and time to do the things you love!

High-speed one-click backup: The reading speed of the photo stick is up to 80mb/s, and the writing speed is up to 40mb/s, which can quickly back up files/photos/videos and phone books, etc. You can also store photos on the computer through the usb port for double insurance. It's worth mentioning that you can share files to social media (Facebook, Twitter, etc.) directly from the jump drive. Easily share data with family and friends, making entertainment and work more fun!

Compatibility and personal privacy: iPhone usb flash drive is compatible for ios7.1.2 and above iPhone iPad/OTG Android phone/computer and other USB interface devices. Different from other iphone photo transfer stick, our photo storage also has an encryption function. You can choose specific files to encrypt.

Reliable after-sales service: Experience the convenience of high-quality USB memory stick and enjoy our premium customer service at the same time. For the lightning flash drive, if you have any questions, we are willing to provide help / warranty / full refund /replacement.(Note: When using a pendrive , iPhone/iPad need to download the "LESOGE" app from the App Store; Android and PC devices can be used directly without downloading any app)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LESOGE MFI certi-fied USB flash drives give you a unique experience. It's the perfect storage solution on the go！ With exceptional storage capacity, it allows you to backup and share all valuable files, photos, videos, and more. The 3-in-1 photo stick for iPhone offers a stylish and sophisticated design that is compatible for features. It easily connects to your keychain and backpack, ensuring your personal documents are never forgotten.

Stylish and durable metal case This usb thumb drive adopts 360-degree rotation design, which has the characteristics of fast heat dissipation and wear resistance. The keychain design adds a touch of fashion, allowing you to personalize your style and use it as a mini-fashion accessory. Dual chip design Intelligent upgrade chips ensure higher efficiency, security, and stability for data transmission. With the LESOGE iphone flash drive 128gb, you'll enjoy a better storage experience. Better compatibility The flash drive for iphone is compatible for ios7.1.2 and above ios devices/OTG Android phones/computers and other USB interface devices. Extensive compatibility allows you to freely transfer data between different devices.

Improve personal privacy protection：The iphone usb storage flash drive features password protection to ensure data security. You can set a password to protect the specific files. Store photos anytime, anywhere: All photos and videos can be directly saved to the usb storage flash drive, eliminating concerns of insufficient phone memory.

About usb flash drive: 1. For iPhone/iPad users, you need to download an APP "LESOGE", which you can search for from the APP store. (When the phone does not recognize the iphone picture storage stick, please uninstall the "LESOGE” APP, then restart the phone and manually download the LESOGE APP from the APP Store) 2. For Android / PC users, our photo stick is plug and play. (Tips: only support Android phones with OTG function) 3. If you used iCloud before, you need to download files to your iPhone/iPad and then copy them to the iphone external storage.

Kindly note： 1. You cannot transfer or view media files downloaded from iTunes or other third-party applications. Because these files are protected by digital rights management. 2. After using the photo stick, please make sure to turn off the APP related to the iphone flash drive, and then unplug the lightning flash drive gently, so that the files in the thumb drive will not be damaged. 3. The recommended format is "exFAT". If the jump drive cannot transfer files, you can convert the USB flash drive to "exFAT" format through the computer. (Please save the file before formatting to avoid data loss)

Kindly note： 1. You cannot transfer or view media files downloaded from iTunes or other third-party applications. Because these files are protected by digital rights management. 2. After using the photo stick, please make sure to turn off the APP related to the iphone flash drive, and then unplug the lightning flash drive gently, so that the files in the thumb drive will not be damaged. 3. The recommended format is "exFAT". If the jump drive cannot transfer files, you can convert the USB flash drive to "exFAT" format through the computer. (Please save the file before formatting to avoid data loss)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars copying and copying and copying!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the small version of this device because it was on sale, and my wife didn’t have that many photos on her phone. It took her three tries to clear all of the photos off of the memory of her phone, because the device fills up to a certain point, and then you have to transfer everything that you put on it to a computer, delete all of the old photos off of your phone you just copy, and then start over again. I have 40,000 photos on my phone so this device will not work well for me because it takes almost a full hour just to prepare one photo to print at CVS device exactly how you would expect it to know about it. No worries or concerns is whether or not your personal information is being stolen because it just wants to copy the information and then deposit it where you want it very nicely made device! highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great flash drive for iPhone
reviews.reviewText: This worked great on my iPhone. It didn’t come with the connector for my iPad. Nicely packaged, securely stored. I was glad for the instructions since I didn’t find it intuitive. Easy to do by following instructions, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was really surprised how well built it is. Very heavy duty and came in a nice case instead of a plastic bag. You have to download an app but thats not a big deal as its easy to use. I cant believe this thing was made in China lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as Advertised
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to transfer PDFs on my iPhone/iPad to my computer and then a flash drive, and it worked well, using the special program provided.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had trouble getting a copy of a video I made transferred from my iPhone to the device. Kept getting an error message. It finally worked, but then a week later the video disappeared from the device and I couldn’t even get the device recognized on my phone, iPad, or desktop computer. Not sure what the problem is, but I’m returning it. Too much trouble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is wonderful to make more room on your phone. I just love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time. Very well packaged. Will not work with case on cell phone. Message from company said it had long connection and should work. A real pain to have to remove case from phone to use. Will not buy from this company again. Too close to Christmas to send back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little hard to connect
reviews.reviewText: Just started using it so I am still skeptical, it’s a little hard to connect but easy to use
